archimate:Requirement.name: SA.2.1.9c: c) a method of minimising business disruption from security incidents (e.g. by blocking the connection (i.e. disconnection of the session) and/or disabling the originating user account)
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
